needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
What's the secret ingredient needed to build the perfect pizza?

The answer is "pride." According to the passage, when a good pizza is made, the "secret ingredient" is the pride, which is the attitude and confidence one has when creating something. Pride is mentioned as a necessary ingredient for building a great pizza, and even better pizza, as exemplified by the example of the artist who makes paintings that last.
